pages.text: Some changes to the Immersive Engineering mod have been made. They are...

pages.title: Renames
pages.text: Fluid Pump>Electric Pump$(br)Lantern>Big Lantern$(br)Conveyor Belt>Rolling Belt$(br)Fluid Pipe>Copper Fluid Pipe

pages.title: Basic Power Generation
pages.text: IE's Water Wheel and Windmill are no longer accessible. Use the $(l:electric_generators)Alternator$() with Create's $(l:kinetic_generators)Water Wheels or Windmills$().

pages.title: Metal Press Changes
pages.text: The Metal Press can no longer use the Packing and Unpacking molds. Use the Mechanical Press instead.

pages.title: Crusher Changes
pages.text: The Crusher's yields have changed from the default. Raw ores give 2 grit, and ore blocks give 3 grit.

pages.title: Rolling Belts
pages.text: Conveyor Belts have been retextured and renamed into Rolling Belts. Aside from the Vertical and Extracting belts, related blocks have been removed.
